issue.title: Pose addition and subtraction needs work

content.raw:
> We should probably add some images to the pose documentation to clarify how the operators work.

Or at least better-expose the documentation. Right now, all the line-breaks in the doxygen doc are removed so it ends up reading like this:

> Subtraction operator A is the transform from O to P in frame O B is the transform from O to Q in frame O B - A is the transform from P to Q in frame P.

http://gazebosim.org/api/2.0.0/classgazebo_1_1math_1_1Pose.html#a33f259dea1e30c954ab09f3d3906dafc
content.html:
We should probably add some images to the pose documentation to clarify how the operators work.

Or at least better-expose the documentation. Right now, all the line-breaks in the doxygen doc are removed so it ends up reading like this:

Subtraction operator A is the transform from O to P in frame O B is the transform from O to Q in frame O B - A is the transform from P to Q in frame P.

http://gazebosim.org/api/2.0.0/classgazebo_1_1math_1_1Pose.html#a33f259dea1e30c954ab09f3d3906dafc
